parameters.name: FlangeEdge
parameters.description: Edge with which to create an edge flange

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: True reverses the offset direction of the flange, false does not

title: IModelDoc2.InsertSketchForEdgeFlange
description: Inserts a profile sketch of an edge flange in this sheet metal part.
signature:
System.Object InsertSketchForEdgeFlange( 
   System.Object
FlangeEdge
,
   System.Double
DAngle
,
   System.Boolean
FlipDir
)

parameters.name: FlangeEdge
parameters.description: Edge with which to create an edge flange

parameters.name: FlipDir
parameters.description: True reverses the offset direction of the flange, false does not

returns: Sketch for the edge flange, returned as a feature
remarks:
After calling this method, you must create the profile for the flange on the appropriate plane. Then use
IFeatureManager::CreateDefinition
,
IEdgeFlangeFeatureData
, and
IFeatureManager::CreateFeature
to create the edge flange.
